translation: Beshak mushkil ke saath aasanai hai.
tafseer: Ye ayat batati hai ke har takleef ke baad aasani hoti hai. Yeh insaan ko sabr aur umeed ka dars deti hai.

translation: Allah asmano aur zameen ka noor hai.
tafseer: Is ayat ka matlab hai ke Allah har jagah roshni aur hidayat ka sar chashma hai.
